ComicInfo.Title: The Renaissance Faire. . .Affair!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Renaissance Faire. . .Affair!: Ma Beagle puts on an elaborate Renaissance Faire to lure the nephews to her, hoping to ransom them off to Scrooge in exchange for the deed to Duckburg.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 13:08:46. [CVDB733725] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:49:50. [Issue ID 2056632]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Dario Calabria,Giuseppe Fontana,Kawaii Creative Studio,Lucio De Giuseppe,Lucio De Giuseppe,Giuseppe Fontana
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Cristina Stella,Kawaii Creative Studio,Lucio De Giuseppe,Marco Ghiglione
ComicInfo.Characters: The Beagle Boys,Webigail Vanderquack,Dewey,Ma Beagle,Huey,Louie,Scrooge McDuck
